name: Andrzej Ito
profile_summary: As an IMS Systems Programmer with over 9 years of experience, I specialize in **IMS DB/DC system programming**, **DL/I**, and **IMS hierarchical database structures**. I have a proven ability to enhance system performance through **IMS performance tuning**, **IMS transaction performance tuning**, and in-depth **problem determination** and **root cause analysis**. My expertise extends to managing **IMS components**, including **DBDs**, **PSBs**, and **ACBs**, and utilizing tools such as **IMS Problem Investigator** and **IMS Performance Analyzer** for comprehensive database management and optimization. I have successfully implemented **disaster recovery processes**, conducted **IMS health checks**, and executed **capacity analysis** to ensure robust system performance. In addition to technical skills, I excel in leading cross-functional teams, mentoring junior engineers, and delivering projects that prioritize user experience and innovation, maintaining a focus on enhancing accessibility throughout my work.
